description.selection: A comprehensive full-stack ecommerce store template with customer storefront, admin dashboard, and Cloudflare Workers backend API. Perfect for building any type of online store - fashion, electronics, general retail, or specialized ecommerce applications. Includes product catalog, shopping cart, checkout flow with Stripe integration, order management, payment tracking, and D1 database schema. Built with React 19, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Hono on Cloudflare Workers.
description.usage:
This is the base ecommerce store template. It provides a complete full-stack foundation for building online stores using Liquid templates for the frontend and admin interfaces.

**Project Structure:**
```
base-store/
├── storefront-app/         # Customer-facing storefront (Liquid templates)
│   ├── theme/             # Liquid theme files
│   │   ├── layouts/       # Base layouts (theme.liquid)
│   │   ├── templates/    # Page templates (index, product, cart, etc.)
│   │   ├── snippets/     # Reusable components (header, footer, product-card)
│   │   ├── assets/       # CSS and JavaScript files
│   │   └── config/       # Liquid filters and configuration
│   ├── server.js         # Liquid rendering server
│   └── package.json
├── admin-app/             # Admin dashboard (Liquid templates)
│   ├── theme/             # Liquid theme files
│   │   ├── layouts/      # Admin layout (admin.liquid)
│   │   ├── templates/    # Admin pages (dashboard, products, orders, payments)
│   │   ├── snippets/     # Admin components (sidebar, stat-card, etc.)
│   │   ├── assets/       # Admin CSS and JavaScript
│   │   └── config/       # Liquid filters
│   ├── server.js         # Liquid rendering server
│   └── package.json
├── src/                   # React components for admin functionality
│   ├── components/admin/ # Admin React components
│   ├── pages/admin/      # Admin page components
│   ├── api/              # API client
│   └── context/          # React context
├── api-worker/            # Cloudflare Workers API (Hono)
│   ├── src/
│   │   ├── index.ts      # API entry point
│   │   ├── middleware/   # Auth, store resolver
│   │   ├── routes/       # API routes (store, admin, webhook)
│   │   └── types.ts
│   └── wrangler.toml
├── worker/                # Additional worker routes
│   ├── index.ts
│   ├── middleware/
│   └── routes/
├── infra/
│   └── db/
│       ├── schema.sql    # D1 database schema
│       └── seed.sql      # Sample data
└── public/               # Static assets
```

**Storefront Features (storefront-app/theme/):**
- Liquid templates for all pages (index, collection, product, cart, success)
- Product catalog with grid views and search
- Shopping cart with local storage persistence (via CartAPI JavaScript)
- Product detail pages with add-to-cart functionality
- Checkout process with Stripe integration hooks
- Responsive design with warm cream and terracotta palette
- Custom Liquid filters for money formatting and asset URLs

**Admin Dashboard Features (admin-app/theme/):**
- Liquid templates for admin interface
- Dashboard with key metrics and statistics
- Product management (CRUD operations)
- Order management and tracking
- Payment monitoring
- Dark theme with responsive sidebar
- React components in src/ for enhanced interactivity

**Edge API Features (api-worker/):**
- RESTful API built with Hono
- Store resolution middleware
- Authentication middleware
- Product, order, and webhook routes
- D1 database integration

**Tech Stack:**
- **Liquid Templates** for storefront and admin UI (Shopify-like structure)
- **React 19** with TypeScript for admin components
- **Hono** for API routing on Cloudflare Workers
- **Tailwind CSS** for styling
- **Cloudflare Workers & D1** for serverless backend
- **liquidjs** for template rendering

**Liquid Template Structure:**
- **Layouts**: Base HTML structure (theme.liquid, admin.liquid)
- **Templates**: Page-specific content (index.liquid, product.liquid, etc.)
- **Snippets**: Reusable components (header.liquid, footer.liquid, etc.)
- **Assets**: CSS and JavaScript files
- **Config**: Custom Liquid filters (money, asset_url)

**DO NOT TOUCH FILES:**
- package.json
- server.js files in storefront-app/ and admin-app/
- tsconfig.json / tsconfig.app.json / tsconfig.node.json
- tailwind.config.js / tailwind.config.cjs
- postcss.config.cjs
- eslint.config.js
- api-worker/package.json
- api-worker/wrangler.toml
- infra/db/schema.sql (structure)
- theme/config/liquid-filters.js (Liquid filter implementations)

**Running Locally:**
```bash
npm install
npm run db:init   # Initialize D1 database
npm run db:seed   # Seed with sample data
npm run dev:api   # Start API worker (port 8787)
# Start storefront and admin servers separately
cd storefront-app && npm start
cd admin-app && npm start
```

**Liquid Template Variables:**
Templates receive data from the API:
- `store` - Store object (id, slug, name, currency, themeConfig)
- `products` - Array of products
- `product` - Single product object
- `request.params` - URL parameters

**API Integration:**
- Storefront and admin apps fetch data from api-worker
- Cart functionality uses CartAPI JavaScript class
- API endpoints: /v1/stores/:slug/products, /v1/stores/:slug/orders, etc.

**Database:**
D1 schema in infra/db/schema.sql includes:
- stores, products, orders, order_items, payments tables

Customize this template for your specific ecommerce needs. Modify Liquid templates in theme/ directories to customize the UI.
